text: Jason Marnocha (born March 9, 1989) is an American voice actor from Indiana. He affiliated with Bang Zoom! Entertainment, FUNimation Entertainment, Sound Cadence Studios and VSI Los Angeles. He is known for Transformers: Combiner Wars (2016), Carole & Tuesday (2019) and JoJo's Bizarre Adventure (2012). Jason is known for his very versatile, but normally deep growly voice where he portrays monsters, villains, and other minor characters in video games or anime series. title: Jason Marnocha
